name: Ibis Styles Alice Springs Oasis

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Professional, helpful, welcoming staff. Good location. Would definatly recommend. Deserves a better rating on here really. Don't be put off.
reviews.title: Great hotel, not as bad as everyone makes out
Return to Alice
reviews.text: We stayed at All Seasons Alice Springs. Great location near shops and service stations. We ate in the restaurant and would highly recommend, it was very good value and quality. All round good service and facilities I would stay there again. Thanks

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I stayed for six days from Monday 09 May on a planned holiday to Alice. We were more than pleased with everything. The meals in the dining room were exceptional, we ate there every night bar one. All staff were courteous and helpful from the time we arrived and I must say that we were really sorry to leave. We slept soundly each night and every morning we enjoyed a good. Could you please pass on our thanks to all your staff, and we will be back!
reviews.title: Quiet, relaxing,comfortable with a most helpfull staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Staff were very helpful and accommodating to a request for a specific room. Facilities were clean and modern and the pool was lovely giving the feeling of a mini-resort. Would definitely stay again.
reviews.title: mini-resort
Friendly Staff
reviews.text: The room was comfortable and the staff friendly which makes a huge difference when you travel a lot. The bathroom needed a bit of attention in the corners but otherwise everything was clean. It was great being able to eat a decent meal without leaving the hotel grounds!

reviews.title: Disappointing accommodation
reviews.text: Unfortunately there was some technical issues with the movies which was a shame as the tv reception also wasn't the best. Not the fault of the staff though and they had reported the issue and were trying to fix it.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Security is an issue in this town yet there was no security chain on the door - it had been broken off and not replaced.
reviews.title: A pleasant, friendly, quiet and clean hotel within walking distance of town centre

reviews.text: The room was comfortable. In need of some maintenance, eg the remote controls for the TV and the airconditioner did not work. There was no lock on the small bathroom window. I could tell someone had gained entry that way and there were dust covered handprints around the window ledge and the ceiling.

aka: All Seasons Alice Springs Oasis Hotel Alice Springs
description: The lovely Ibis Styles Alice Springs Oasis sits just minutes from the town centre and features 102 rooms and two pools set among tropical gardens, a spa, BBQ area, restaurant and bar. Ibis Styles Alice Springs Oasis is ideal when exploring the attractions of Alice Springs, including the Royal Flying Doctor Service and Desert Park. Alice Springs is also the gateway to Ayers Rock, the Olgas and Kings Canyon. The hotel room rate includes free continental breakfast and 15 minutes free wifi. Come to Alice Springs and meet some of the friendliest people in the country.
